title: Libray Management System
description: A Library Management System (LMS) is software designed to automate and streamline library operations, such as keeping track of books, managing user memberships, and handling borrowing/return transactions. This system reduces the need for manual effort and helps in maintaining accurate records of all operations.

title: ChatBot Using React Native
description: The chatbot I developed is a React Native mobile application integrated with Google APIs to provide real-time conversational assistance. The chatbot is designed to simulate human-like conversations and perform various tasks like answering user
